Emines.name: Emines
Emines.description: Emines is a university in Morocco that offers a computer science program and other engineering courses.

Announcements.description: Join the Emines Hackathon, a 24-hour coding competition to innovate and develop unique projects. Starts at 10:00 AM on 15/12/2024.
A platform for students to pitch their startup ideas to industry leaders and potential investors. Begins at 6:00 PM on 20/12/2024.
Connect with Emines alumni and explore career opportunities. Held in the main auditorium at 4:00 PM on 10/01/2025.

SAP+D.name: SAP+D
SAP+D.description: The School of Architecture, Planning, and Design at UM6P offers programs in architecture and design.

Announcements.description: Showcasing the innovative projects and designs by SAP+D students. Opens at 11:00 AM on 05/01/2025.
A hands-on workshop focusing on sustainable architecture and green building techniques. Starts at 9:00 AM on 12/01/2025.

Staff.name: Dr. Fatima Zahra El Amrani
Staff.description: A renowned architect with expertise in sustainable urban planning and green architecture.

Staff.name: Dr. Ahmed Bennani
Staff.description: Specialist in contemporary design and advanced construction technologies.

GTI.name: GTI
GTI.description: The Global Technology Institute in Morocco offers a wide range of technology-focused academic programs.

Announcements.description: Explore the latest trends in AI and data science with industry experts. Starts at 9:00 AM on 25/12/2024.
Hands-on cybersecurity training for students. Starts at 2:00 PM on 15/01/2025.

Staff.name: Dr. Youssef Khattabi
Staff.description: Expert in artificial intelligence and machine learning with over 15 years of academic and industry experience.

1337.description: 1337 is a leading coding school in Morocco, known for its innovative approach to computer programming education.

Announcements.description: A week-long celebration of coding with competitions, workshops, and prizes. Starts on 01/12/2024.
A competition focused on solving real-world problems using artificial intelligence. Starts at 10:00 AM on 08/01/2025.

Staff.name: Dr. Soumaya El Fassi
Staff.description: A data scientist and educator with expertise in big data analytics and cloud computing.

College of Computing.name: College of Computing
College of Computing.description: The College of Computing at UM6P focuses on advanced studies in computer science and engineering.

Announcements.description: A series of seminars and workshops on data science and analytics. Starts on 10/01/2025.
An intensive training program on cloud technologies. Starts at 9:00 AM on 20/01/2025.

Staff.name: Dr. Mohamed Amine Haddadi
Staff.description: A leading researcher in cloud computing and distributed systems.
